atk-abh03a38:2_0: 908. Idāni ekādhippāyakathā nāma hoti. Tattha kāruññena vā ekena adhippāyena ekādhippāyo,
atk-abh03a38:2_1: saṁsāre vā ekato bhavissāmāti itthiyā saddhiṁ buddhapūjādīni katvā paṇidhivasena
atk-abh03a38:2_2: eko adhippāyo assāti ekādhippāyo. Evarūpo dvinnampi janānaṁ ekādhippāyo methuno dhammo
atk-abh03a38:2_3: paṭisevitabboti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva vetullakānañca; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a38:2_4: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a38:5_0: 909. Idāni arahantavaṇṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha iriyāpathasampanne ākappasampanne
atk-abh03a38:5_1: pāpabhikkhū disvā ‘‘arahantānaṁ vaṇṇena amanussā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantī’’ti
atk-abh03a38:5_2: yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ uttarāpathakānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a38:8_0: 910-914. Idāni issariyakāmakārikākathā nāma hoti. Chaddantajātakādīni sandhāya ‘‘bodhisatto
atk-abh03a38:8_1: issariyakāmakārikāhetu vinipātaṁ gacchati, gabbhaseyyaṁ okkamati, dukkarakārikaṁ
atk-abh03a38:8_2: akāsi, aparantapaṁ akāsi, aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ,
atk-abh03a38:8_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṁ paṭhamakathāyaṁ uttānatthameva.
atk-abh03a38:8_4: Dutiyakathāyaṁ iddhimāti yadi issariyakāmakārikāhetu gaccheyya, iddhiyā gaccheyya,
atk-abh03a38:8_5: na kammavasenāti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Itaro pana paṭhamapañhe bhāvanāmayaṁ sandhāya
atk-abh03a38:8_6: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyapañhe puññiddhiṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Tatiyakathāyaṁ issariyakāmakārikāhetu
atk-abh03a38:8_7: nāma dukkarakārikā micchādiṭṭhiyā kariyati. Yadi ca so taṁ kareyya, sassatādīnipi
atk-abh03a38:8_8: gaṇheyyāti codanatthaṁ sassato lokotiādi vuttaṁ. Catutthakathāyampi eseva nayoti.
atk-abh03a38:11_0: 915-916. Idāni rāgapatirūpakathā nāma hoti. Tattha mettākaruṇāmuditāyo sandhāya ‘‘na
atk-abh03a38:11_1: rāgo rāgapatirūpako’’ti ca issāmacchariyakukkuccāni sandhāya ‘‘na doso dosapatirūpako’’ti
atk-abh03a38:11_2: ca hasituppādaṁ sandhāya ‘‘na moho mohapatirūpako’’ti ca dummaṅkūnaṁ puggalānaṁ niggahaṁ
atk-abh03a38:11_3: pesalānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anuggahaṁ pāpagarahitaṁ kalyāṇapasaṁsaṁ āyasmato pilindavacchassa
atk-abh03a38:11_4: vasalavādaṁ bhagavato kheḷāsakavādaṁ moghapurisavādañca sandhāya ‘‘na kileso kilesapatirūpako’’ti
atk-abh03a38:11_5: ca yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya sabbakathāsu pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a38:11_6: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ yasmā phassādipatirūpakā naphassādayo nāma natthi, tasmā
atk-abh03a38:11_7: rāgādipatirūpakā narāgādayopi natthīti codetuṁ atthi na phassotiādimāha . Itaro tesaṁ
atk-abh03a38:15: ‘‘Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṁ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
atk-abh03a38:16: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṁ dukkhā nirujjhatī’’ti. (saṁ. ni. 1.171) –
atk-abh03a38:17_0: Vacanaṁ nissāya dukkhaññeva parinipphannaṁ, sesā khandhāyatanadhātuindriyadhammā
atk-abh03a38:17_1: aparinipphannāti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ uttarapathakānañceva hetuvādānañca;
atk-abh03a38:17_2: te sandhāya rūpaṁ aparinipphannanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ
atk-abh03a38:17_3: ‘‘sace rūpaṁ aparinipphannaṁ, na aniccādisabhāvaṁ siyā’’ti codetuṁ rūpaṁ na aniccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a38:17_4: Itaro tathārūpaṁ rūpaṁ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Sakavādī nanu rūpaṁ aniccantiādi vacanena
atk-abh03a38:17_5: tassa ekaṁ laddhiṁ paṭisedhetvā dutiyaṁ pucchanto dukkhaññeva parinipphannantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a38:17_6: Athassa tampi laddhiṁ paṭisedhetuṁ na yadaniccantiādimāha. Tatrāyaṁ adhippāyo – na
atk-abh03a38:17_7: kevalañhi paṭhamasaccameva dukkhaṁ. Yaṁ pana kiñci aniccaṁ, taṁ dukkhameva. Rūpañca
atk-abh03a38:17_8: aniccaṁ, tasmā tampi parinipphannaṁ. Iti yaṁ tvaṁ vadesi ‘‘rūpaṁ aparinipphannaṁ,
atk-abh03a38:17_9: dukkhaññeva parinipphanna’’nti, taṁ no vata re vattabbe ‘‘dukkhaññeva parinipphanna’’nti.
atk-abh03a38:17_10: Vedanādimūlikādīsupi yojanāsu eseva nayo. Dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu pana ṭhapetvā
atk-abh03a38:17_11: nibbānaṁ sesadhammānaṁ vasena aniccatā veditabbā. Indriyāni aniccānevāti.
atk-abh03a38:22: Paṇṇāsakehi catūhi, tīhi vaggehi ceva ca;
atk-abh03a38:25: Yaṁ jino desayi tassa, niṭṭhitā atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a38:28: Yaṁ pattaṁ kusalaṁ tena, lokoyaṁ sanarāmaro;
